name: DrawTheLine
description:
First complete Game I developed.

It's a little endless runner in which you must match the obstacle color with your ball color. Draw Lines will help you. 

PC Controls:

A,S,D - change Ball color

Q,W - Use Upgrades

Mouse - Draw Line

Includes Upgrades, Customization and music based environment.

Soon available on Google Play.

Enjoy and send Feedback if you want :)

Music by:

http://www.nihilore.com/

https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Monkey_Warhol
